attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!
attributes.review: Do NOT waste your time on this app! I got a message from the official phone number and told me they were going to steal my refrigerator! Unbelievable! How did they even know I had a refrigerator? This app is useless and i honestly believe there is some kind of high tech spy camera imbedded in the app. Donâ€™t download the app unless you want someone to steal your fridge! Pointless piece of junk app. And WHY ON EARTH IS THERE A CHEETO ON THE WELCOME SCREEN?!?!

attributes.title: Horrible.
attributes.review: I was expecting a quality app but was not what I got. This app not only drained my phones battery but after I downloaded it everything else on my phone was erased. This app is a data miner and only wants to steal your information and should be removed from this App Store. Because of this app I lost everything on my phone. Terrible. Waste of space.

attributes.title: GREAT APP
attributes.review: If you are a Trump supporter this is a must have app. Everything about this app is excellent they show you where he will be when he will be there upcoming events etc.... I absolutely love it. Trump 2020

attributes.title: extremely disappointing
attributes.review: The app downloaded a malware byte to my phone. I had to pay someone to help me figure out why my phone was running so slow and sending me scary messages. Once we figured out the problem, I had to pay money to get it removed. So many bugs and glitches. Overall, extremely disappointed in this app.

attributes.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP
attributes.review: Shortly after downloading this app, my phone had pop up viruses that were very annoying and stressful. Apparently others have had the same experience so I deleted the app and there now seems to be no problem. Hopefully there arenâ€™t any remaining issues after deleting the app, but I would highly caution anyone from downloading this.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!

I rlly thought apple was better than this. and donâ€™t forget the fact that it is tracking me and steeling all of my personal information! my credit card got hacked and my identity got stolen shortly after downloading!

attributes.title: DO NOT BE FOOLED
attributes.userName: can you feel the bern tonight
attributes.review: i was told this was an app for bernie supporters, and let's just say that was FAR from the truth. the title is VERY misleading and when i opened the app it redirected me to a video of a clan of GIANT iguanas throwing crickets, banana peels, used waxing strips, and toe nail shavings into a bonfire- all while singing trisha paytas' cover of "shallow" by lady gaga... i cannot believe THIS is the kind of content i was subjected to, although the iguana cult was a much better sight than all that "MAGA propaganda".
